list.li: Use controlled vocabularies such as the CESSDA Topic Classification or the Nippon Decimal Classification. You may also use the table of contents of the Japan Statistical Yearbook.
Enter subject terms, author keywords, and classifications that describe the content. For classification, input only the code.
Select the subjectScheme from a controlled vocabulary.
Enter the subjectURI as an HTTP URI using the ID value. If there is no URI, do not specify the subjectURI (e.g., https://id.ndl.go.jp/auth/ndlsh/00575529).
